title: update latest OAT trying to fix freeze on google logo issue but still fail?
content:
The issues happened on 4/6 2021
screen stuck on google logo during startup.

I've tried to update latest OAT. Anything else I can do can bring it back to normal?
   cell phone screen shown as below
computer screen as below

I tried couple times and looks all the same stop at ~94%

as of today, the problem still.............freeze at google logo during startup
